text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: During breathing or respiration, air flows to and from the lungs, where gas exchange occurs, absorbing oxygen from the air into the blood and exhaling carbon dioxide into the air. Observations of spontaneous breathing, usually registered as part of the observation of vital functions.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Respiration-v3.2(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Respiration-v3.2(2020EN)).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

comment.value:
Several concepts of zib Respiration are represented using distinct Observation resources. These are grouped using the current resource and are referenced on `Observation.hasMember`:
* BreathingFrequency (NL-CM:12.5.2): [zib-Respiration.BreathingFrequency](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.BreathingFrequency) * Rhythm (NL-CM:12.5.5): [zib-Respiration.Rhythm](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.Rhythm) * Depth (NL-CM:12.5.6): [zib-Respiration.Depth](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.Depth) * DeviatingBreathingPattern (NL-CM:12.5.7): [zib-Respiration.DeviatingBreathingPattern](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.DeviatingBreathingPattern) * ExtraOxygenAdministration (NL-CM:12.5.12): [zib-Respiration.ExtraOxygenAdministration](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.ExtraOxygenAdministration) * FlowRate (NL-CM:12.5.10): [zib-Respiration.AdministeredOxygen.FlowRate](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib- Respiration.AdministeredOxygen.FlowRate) * FiO2 (NL-CM:12.5.9): [zib-Respiration.AdministeredOxygen.FiO2](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.AdministeredOxygen.FiO2)
Note that the concepts FlowRate and FiO2 are grouped in the AdministeredOxygen container on the zib level. This container is left out in the FHIR modeling as it servers no practical purpose in exchange of this information. A respiration assessment can contain just a single observation about administered oxygen and the definition codes for these two concepts are sufficient to encode what the information is about.
In addition, the AdministrationDevice concept (NL-CM:12.5.13) is represented using the [zib-Respiration.AdministrationDevice](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration.AdministrationDevice) profile on the DeviceUseStatement resource. It can be referenced using `.extension:administrationDevice`.

definition.value: Date and if possible time of measurement.
Comment on additional factors that can influence breathing such as the extent of fear, pain, nutrition in the case of infants or a tracheostomy.
